response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value of your business operations. Given its high worth to you at $15,000, I propose an offer to acquire it from you at a price reflecting its true value and my commitment to providing exceptional quality. My offer is $14,000. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also allows us to collaborate effectively, leveraging your expertise while contributing to your financial goals. I look forward to discussing this opportunity further with you.", "product_price": 14000}
